verses.verse: Then came<WH935> David<WH1732> to Nob<WH5011> to<WH413> Ahimelech<WH288> the priest:<WH3548> and Ahimelech<WH288> was afraid<WH2729> at the meeting<WH7125> of David,<WH1732> and said<WH559> unto him, Why<WH4069> art thou<WH859> alone,<WH905> and no<WH369> man<WH376> with<WH854> thee?

Now <WH6258> therefore what<WH4100> is<WH3426> under<WH8478> thine hand?<WH3027> give<WH5414> me five<WH2568> loaves of bread<WH3899> in mine hand,<WH3027> or<WH176> what there is present.<WH4672>

And the priest<WH3548> answered<WH6030> <WH853> David,<WH1732> and said,<WH559> There is no<WH369> common<WH2455> bread<WH3899> under<WH413> <WH8478> mine hand,<WH3027> but<WH3588> <WH518> there is<WH3426> hallowed<WH6944> bread;<WH3899> if<WH518> the young men<WH5288> have kept themselves<WH8104> at least<WH389> from women.<WH4480> <WH802>

And David<WH1732> answered<WH6030> <WH853> the priest,<WH3548> and said<WH559> unto him, Of<WH3588> <WH518> a truth women<WH802> have been kept<WH6113> from us about these three<WH8032> days,<WH8543> since I came out,<WH3318> and the vessels<WH3627> of the young men<WH5288> are holy,<WH6944> and the bread is in a manner<WH1870> common,<WH2455> yea,<WH637> though<WH3588> it were sanctified<WH6942> this day<WH3117> in the vessel.<WH3627>

So the priest<WH3548> gave<WH5414> him hallowed<WH6944> bread: for<WH3588> there was<WH1961> no<WH3808> bread<WH3899> there<WH8033> but<WH3588> <WH518> the shewbread,<WH3899> <WH6440> that was taken<WH5493> from before<WH4480> <WH6440> the LORD,<WH3068> to put<WH7760> hot<WH2527> bread<WH3899> in the day<WH3117> when it was taken away.<WH3947>

Now a certain man<WH376> of the servants<WH4480> <WH5650> of Saul<WH7586> was there<WH8033> that<WH1931> day,<WH3117> detained<WH6113> before<WH6440> the LORD;<WH3068> and his name<WH8034> was Doeg,<WH1673> an Edomite,<WH130> the chiefest<WH47> of the herdsmen<WH7462> that<WH834> belonged to Saul.<WH7586>

And David<WH1732> said<WH559> unto Ahimelech,<WH288> And is there<WH3426> not<WH371> here<WH6311> under<WH8478> thine hand<WH3027> spear<WH2595> or<WH176> sword?<WH2719> for<WH3588> I have neither<WH1571> <WH3808> brought<WH3947> my sword<WH2719> nor<WH1571> my weapons<WH3627> with<WH3027> me, because<WH3588> the king's<WH4428> business<WH1697> required<WH1961> haste.<WH5169>

And the priest<WH3548> said,<WH559> The sword<WH2719> of Goliath<WH1555> the Philistine,<WH6430> whom<WH834> thou slewest<WH5221> in the valley<WH6010> of Elah,<WH425> behold,<WH2009> it<WH1931> is here wrapped<WH3874> in a cloth<WH8071> behind<WH310> the ephod:<WH646> if<WH518> thou wilt take<WH3947> that, take<WH3947> it: for<WH3588> there is no<WH369> other<WH312> save<WH2108> that here.<WH2088> And David<WH1732> said,<WH559> There is none<WH369> like that; give<WH5414> it me.
And David<WH1732> arose,<WH6965> and fled<WH1272> that<WH1931> day<WH3117> for fear of<WH4480> <WH6440> Saul,<WH7586> and went<WH935> to<WH413> Achish<WH397> the king<WH4428> of Gath.<WH1661>

And the servants<WH5650> of Achish<WH397> said<WH559> unto<WH413> him, Is not<WH3808> this<WH2088> David<WH1732> the king<WH4428> of the land?<WH776> did they not<WH3808> sing one to another<WH6030> of him<WH2088> in dances,<WH4246> saying,<WH559> Saul<WH7586> hath slain<WH5221> his thousands,<WH505> and David<WH1732> his ten thousands?<WH7233>
And David<WH1732> laid up<WH7760> <WH853> these<WH428> words<WH1697> in his heart,<WH3824> and was sore<WH3966> afraid<WH3372> of<WH4480> <WH6440> Achish<WH397> the king<WH4428> of Gath.<WH1661>

And he changed<WH8138> <WH853> his behavior<WH2940> before<WH5869> them, and feigned himself mad<WH1984> in their hands,<WH3027> and scrabbled<WH8427> on<WH5921> the doors<WH1817> of the gate,<WH8179> and let his spittle<WH7388> fall down<WH3381> upon<WH413> his beard.<WH2206>
Then said<WH559> Achish<WH397> unto<WH413> his servants,<WH5650> Lo,<WH2009> ye see<WH7200> the man<WH376> is mad:<WH7696> wherefore<WH4100> then have ye brought<WH935> him to<WH413> me?

Have I<WH589> need<WH2638> of mad men,<WH7696> that<WH3588> ye have brought<WH935> <WH853> this<WH2088> fellow to play the mad man<WH7696> in my presence?<WH5921> shall this<WH2088> fellow come<WH935> into<WH413> my house?<WH1004>
